toggle_switch.title: Enable exploit fixes
toggle_switch.description: Attempts to repatch bad/missing patches that should have been made by the exploit. This helps ensure system stability after the initial jailbreak process.

toggle_switch.title: Enable memory mapping patches
toggle_switch.description: Enable memory mapping patches for decrypting binary files. These patches allow the system to properly handle encrypted executables and libraries.

toggle_switch.title: Block firmware updates
toggle_switch.description: Block console firmware updates by unmounting the `/update` partition. This prevents accidental firmware updates that could patch the exploits.
toggle_switch.confirm: Are you sure you want to change this setting? Disabling might lead to accidental updates.

toggle_switch.title: Disable userland ASLR
toggle_switch.description: Disable userland ASLR (Address Space Layout Randomization). Disabling it can improve compatibility with homebrew applications, debuggers, and cheats.

toggle_switch.title: Enable NoBD patches
toggle_switch.description: NoBD (No Blu-ray Drive) patches - allows system updates without a working Blu-ray drive.

list.title: Target ID spoofer
list.description: Changes the console's reported Target ID for development or region-specific functionality.

toggle_switch.title: Skip userland patches
toggle_switch.description: Skip applying SceShellCore, SceShellUI, and RemotePlay patches. Useful for testkit users.

toggle_switch.title: Write HEN plugin files to HDD
toggle_switch.description: Write the default HEN plugin PRX files to the console's hard drive. Enabling this is recommended for first-time setup.

toggle_switch.title: Enable plugin system
toggle_switch.description: Enable HEN plugin file loading and execution system. This feature activates the plugin subsystem that allows loading of additional PRX modules to extend HEN's capabilities. Such as this extended settings menu.
toggle_switch.confirm: Are you sure you want to change this setting? If disabling will not allow the following features: ★ HEN Settings Menu FTP Server Kernel Log Server Plugins load for apps

link.title: Install Package from Hard Disk
link.description: Place package files into /data/pkg. Recursive path not supported.

link.title: Install Package from USB Storage
link.description: Place package files into root of USB Storage. Recursive path not supported.
